Author: vydka
Text: Take a deep breath. I got married in October so I get exactly where your head is at.  You are going to look absolutely beautiful. Your dress is going to flatter you in all of the right places, the photographer is going to get all of the right angles, and your happiness when you see your fiancé waiting for you at the end of the aisle beaming is going to turn you into a blinding ray of pure beauty.  When you look back on all of your pictures you’re going to see laughter, smiles, love and happiness. Don’t let this bitch of a disorder take this day from you.

Author: UnusualReport
Text: First of all congratulations!  In 50 years you will be looking back and seeing this as the time that was hard but you pulled through. It will be part of many fond memories. You got this.   &#x200B;
